___version.description: The version number of Crate that should be used for the framework.

___http-port.description: HTTP port of the Crate instances.

___principal.description: The Mesos principal used for framework authentication.

___enabled.description: Whether framework authentication should be enabled. Requires principal and secret to be set.

___secret.description: The Mesos secret used for framework authentication.

___user.description: User to run the framework as.

___zookeeper.description: URL to the Zookeeper Crate will communicate to (without protocol prefix, e.g. mesos-master:2181)

___api-port.description: Port for the REST API of the Crate Mesos Framework.

___cluster-name.description: The name of the Crate cluster.

___data-path.description: The absolute path where Crate should store table data. Note that the user `crate` needs write access!

___blob-path.description: The absolute path where Crate should store blobs. Note that the user `crate` needs write access!

___transport-port.description: Internal transport port of the Crate instances.
